text: Myristica macrantha is a species of plant in the family Myristicaceae. It is endemic to Fiji. ==References== * World Conservation Monitoring Centre 1998. Myristica macrantha. 2006 IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. Downloaded on 22 August 2007. title: Myristica macrantha
